title: Universal Design for Learning (UDL)-Based Surgical Education Project

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: A blended learning environment using digital devices, emphasizing remote collaboration and simulation-based practical training considering social distancing scenarios.

learning_goals: Learners can explain basic steps of surgical procedures and replicate three or more steps using simulation tools

Learners select one of three given surgical scenarios in a PBL team project (4 members), collaboratively design solutions with teammates, create a 10-minute presentation, and achieve an average score of ≥3.5 on a peer evaluation rubric (5-point scale, 4 criteria).
Create and utilize learner-customized educational materials in accordance with Universal Design for Learning (UDL) principles
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
